title: Pedestrian traffic lights should be provided with clear audible signals and these acoustic devices s
clause_text: Pedestrian traffic lights should be provided with clear audible signals and these acoustic devices should be installed on a pole at the point at the origin of crossing and not at the point of destination Signages for Foot over bridges and Subways are to be provided. There should be a provision of slope ramps/lifts at both ends to enable wheelchair accessibility. Provisions of a sidewalk are to be followed 5.0Guidelines and Provisions: For details & additional information/guidelines reference may be made to following The Handbook on Barrier Free and Accessibility”, (2014), Central Public Works Department, GoI
